wikipedia_page.main: George Dodd (18 September 1808 – 21 January 1881) was an English journalist and writer. His best known work was The Food of London (1856).

response: * George Dodd (jockey) (1863–1881), Australian jockey, correct name John Dodd
* George Dodd (MP) (circa 1800 – 1864), English member of Parliament for Maidstone
* George Dodd (Australian writer) (active since 1990), Australian comedy writer
* George Dodd (tennis) (1883–1957), South African tennis player
